plugins.name: postgres-setup
plugins.description: Standardized PostgreSQL database setup pattern with schema.sql and Python setup script. Supports project-specific naming, test databases, and follows best practices for Unix timestamps, UUIDs, and idempotent operations.

plugins.name: python-pypi-setup
plugins.description: Modern Python package setup for PyPI publishing with pyproject.toml, src layout, hatchling build system, comprehensive .gitignore, and automated build-publish script. Follows PEP 517/518 standards.
